import "./profile.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { Context } from "../../../context/Context"; export default function Profile() { const { user } = useContext(Context); useEffect(() => { const fetchUpload = async () => { const res = await fetch("/publishers/my-uploads/" + user._id); setUpload(res.data); }; fetchUpload(); }, []); // const PF = "http://localhost/4000/images" return (

My Profile New alerts

{user.firstName}

{user.email}
{user.uploads}

Published
Address
{user.address}
Country
{user.country}
Phone Number
{user.phoneNumber}
Account Details
Bank: {user.bankName}
Name: {user.accountName}
Account: {user.accountNumber}
); }
